column1: Uchi////We love Uchi. Their Happy Hour is excellent
column2: but we also love going for special occasions (birthdays
column6: and Beans are our favorite (although we think Beans no longer works there). I like to start and end my meal with anchovies and avocado sushi combination
column7: and usually like to get an order of the A & A in the middle too (it's delicious (shout out to Beans for putting us on)). We are basically best friends with Aisha and Alesha (sp)
column8: whether or not the feeling is mutual is besides the point). They also have delicious drinks
column9: and if you don't know what you want to eat
column10: just sit back and they will make recommendations to your heart's content.
